page.title: 19Mattingley Area - Media.
page.content: National & International news is obtained through the usual sources - newspapers, radio, T.V. & the T.V. teletext service. The area sometimes features on{local radio}('210' or 'County Sound'). Local news is rep- orted through the 2 main newspapers, {Basingstoke Gazette}& the rival news- paper{Fleet News.}The block falls between these distribution areas. The {Hart Observer}covers the area well & has only been launched this year. The {2 parish magazines}give details of local activities, Church services, outings etc. & are published monthly. The Mattingley church services are also listed in{'Focus'}- the village magazine for Hook & Rotherwick, each month. The Hartley Wintney Preserv- ation Society produces the bi-annual {'Hartley Row Journal'}that sometimes mentions the Mattingley area.
